message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My offer for the product would be $75.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $82.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I still believe we can reach an even better agreement. My counteroffer for the product would be $80.
